general.description: Alexian is the closest thing the Za'lek have to a capital. It is where the COnsortium of Universities convene, and where the Acadamy of Military Sciences makes its headquarters. Much of the planet is off-limits to outsiders, but the spaceport and bar are both open to the public.
general.bar: the bar is populated by scientists and groups of Military Acadamy cadets chatting amiably. Nontheless there seems to be a lot of tension between certain groups of Za'lek.
